routing.name: Routing
routing.desc: Your units will learn the process of selecting a path.
routing.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the speed of your units by 0.5%.

closecombat.name: Close Combat
closecombat.desc: Prepare your units to physical confrontations.
closecombat.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the physical damage of your Melee units by 1%.

firearms.name: Introduction to pistol rifle & shotgun
firearms.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the physical damage of your Range units by 1%.

information.name: Information Procurement
information.desc: Improve the efficience of your damages and give you more options!
information.feature: UNIQUE : Can remove the fog of war.

sniping.name: Sniper Trains
sniping.desc: Eagles do not fly with pigeons!
sniping.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the physical damage of your Snipers by 1%.

spiritwine.name: Spirit Wine
spiritwine.desc: Do as much damage to the enemy as possible... before what you know.
spiritwine.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the physical damage of your Hobos by 1%.

coordination.name: Coordination
coordination.desc: By working together your units tend to keep their role as core!
coordination.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase your offensive/defensive power by 1%.

chemical.name: Chemical Training
chemical.desc: Use chemicals formulated to inflict death or harm on opponents!
chemical.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the chemical damage of your Units by 1%.

weapon.name: Weapon master
weapon.desc: Use weapons to inflict death or harm on opponents!
weapon.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the weapon damage of your Units by 1%.

fire.name: Fire Training
fire.desc: Use fire to inflict death or harm on opponents!
fire.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the fire damage of your Units by 1%.

protection.name: Protection
protection.desc: Tired of losing your units? offers them protection.
protection.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the health of all units by 1%.

bomb.name: Bomb Construction
bomb.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the damage of Bazookas by 1%.

psychological.name: Psychological Training
psychological.desc: Psychological torture will leave no trace ... at least physicaly.
psychological.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the damage and the defense of your elite units by 0.5%.
